result.title: Skills catalogue for the raw materials sector
result.description: This deliverable will report on the skills identified as the key skills for raw materials education. This includes the definition of a coherent system of skills (and the corresponding boundary) used by the raw materials sector (going far beyond the geoscience professions recognised by the multilingual classification of European Skills, Competences, Qualifications and Occupations - ESCO). The data will be available as a report and will subsequently be used throughout the project as a key for further interpretation and definitions.

result.title: The Atlas of Smart City and standards
result.description: A geoportal providing access (on a geographical basis) to a large database of companies, RTD centres, government institutions, NGOs, associations, etc., in the various sectorial domains. The portal will be maintained up to 5 years after the conclusion of the project. Collection of personal data will be carried on after collecting explicit consent of the stakeholders, as detailed within Section 5 on ethical issues.
